DOC.brief_summary: This study aim describe patient characteristic , feasibility , outcomes home mechanical ventilation ( HMV ) program university hospital Thailand .
DOC.brief_title: Patient Characteristics , Feasibility , Outcomes Home Mechanical Ventilation Program Developing Country
DOC.detailed_description: Data collect patient discharge HMV October 2014 August 2015 Thammasat University Hospital . Data include sex , age , co-morbid disease , clinical feature , cause HMV , mechanical ventilator complimentary equipment characteristic , caregiver characteristic , ventilator patient care cost , morbidity mortality outcomes patient .
DOC.criteria: All hospitalize patient require mechanical ventilation age 18 year .
